subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|穴|牙|ls=ic|t1=cave|t2=tooth}} – to penetrate through, to pass through.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms}}
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro}}; cognate with {{cog|bo|རྟོལ||to bore; to pierce; to perforate}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|Min}} to [[wear]]; to [[put on]] (clothing); to have (clothing) on
